title: Barking Dogs Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Barking Dogs Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Barking Dogs Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 229
items.arabic: ((إِذَا سَمِعْتُمْ نُبَاحَ الْكِلاَبِ وَنَهِيقَ الْحَمِيرِ بِاللَّيْلِ فَتَعَوَّذُوا بِاللَّهِ مِنْهُنَّ؛ فَإِنَّهُنَّ يَرَيْنَ مَا لاَ تَرَوْنَ)).
items.translation: If you hear the barking of dogs or the braying of asses at night, seek refuge in Allah for they see what you do not.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء سماع نباح الكلاب
